Text: I'm currently 300+ miles from home and it appears my server has crashed during the forum capture, my wife being as useful as a chocolate fireguard when it comes to tech support, can't help at the mo - I'll take a look when I get home tomorrow night and see what I can do from there... :)
Thanks! Even though you are a long way from home, you still manage to help us fans who can't see the race, otherwise! Can wait for the Forum. Thanks, M8 - from an Englishman abroad!

^ Oh sad.. but no issues.. you do so much for us .. all the hardwork man. thanks a million. 

between can it be downloaded of the iPlayer also? then u can upload.. i mean is it differ.. any how in quality. but then it might take more time to encode/upload right.

Regards
